results.content:
I was not aware that there were so many dependencies. I was hoping more for an overview.
Very fast, display of authors abilities, not much instruction. Must be familiar with rails to get anything out of this.
The peer reviewers from Eduonix Learning Solutions and/or Udemy did not do their job.  A better title for this would be
Examples of Beginner Test Driven Development for experienced HTTP/XML developers using tools Rails, Poltergeist, and Copybara.  None of the principles of Test Driven Design were presented. There was no benefit for developers in C++, SQL, or Python.
